Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: visudo
Description: Visudo edits the sudoers file, which defines the users and groups with administrator rights

Arguments.Name: --check
Arguments.Description: Checking existing sudoers file for syntax errors

Arguments.Name: --file
Arguments.Description: Set an alternative sudoers file location

Arguments.Name: --quiet
Arguments.Description: Enable quiet mode (syntax error not printed)

Arguments.Name: --strict
Arguments.Description: Enable strict checking of the sudoers file

Arguments.Name: --export
Arguments.Description: Export JSON and write it to output_file

Arguments.Name: --perms
Arguments.Description: Enforce default mode for the sudoers file

Arguments.Name: --owner
Arguments.Description: Enforce the default ownership for the sudoers file
